DOC.brief_summary: Currently , BP measure use inflatable cuff wrap around patient 's upper arm . This set inflate every minute , measurement may fail due patient movement shiver . Failed measurement occurs 38 % patient . This study aim determine Nexfin device - measure BP use cuff wrap around finger - compare standard BP measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Agreement Nexfin™ Monitor With Non-invasive Blood Pressure Measurement
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim determine Nexfin device - measure BP use cuff wrap around finger - compare standard BP measurement .
DOC.criteria: Healthy female pregnant patient ≥19 year old Undergoing elective Cesarean section spinal combine spinalepidural anesthesia Contraindication wear Nexfin cuff ( upper limb vascular disease , amputate digit ) Obesity ( BMI > 38 kg/m2 ) Use arterial line BP measurement Inability read understand English
